thread.section_title: Alibaba.com 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 Alibaba.com 的点评意见 | www.alibaba.com
thread.title: Sylvestre

author: Sylvestre
title: Sylvestre
text: I've received an email from them from whatever reason, of course it was classified as spam but I still don't like when my email address wanders in the wild so I wanted to oppose to its usage in writing. Of course, no way to do that via email even when you read their privacy policy, being based in Europe I need to write a letter to their London base. Although I will probably do so, it makes it very slow and difficult.
